parameters.name: plugininstances
parameters.help: string representing a comma-separated list of plugin instance ids

parameters.name: filter
parameters.help: string representing a comma-separated list of regular expressions to filter each of the input plugin instances' output dirs

parameters.name: groupByInstance
parameters.help: if set then an output directory is created for each input plugin instance within this plugin app's output path

title: A ChRIS ts app to copy filtered output dirs from a list of plugin instances
description: A plugin ts app to copy filtered output dirs from a list of plugin instances
